bk_configmap_file.body:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: myconfigmap
  labels:
    app: myapplication
data:
  my-properties-file.yaml: |
    # yaml file
    key: value

bk_configmap.body:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: myconfigmap
  labels:
    app: myapplication
data:
  my-key: my-value

bk_configmap_kv_file.description: Configmap with a key/value pair and file
bk_configmap_kv_file.body:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: myconfigmap
  labels:
    app: myapplication
data:
  my-key: my-value
 my-properties-file.yaml: |
    # yaml file
    key: value
